General.Name: Havilah Resources Limited
General.Description: Havilah Resources Limited, together with its subsidiaries, explores for and develops mineral properties in South Australia. The company explores for copper, gold, cobalt, iron ore, lead, zinc, molybdenum, tin, and uranium deposits. Its flagship mineral project is the 100% owned Kalkaroo copper-gold-cobalt project located in Australia. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Kent Town, Australia.
General.Address: 107 Rundle Street, Kent Town, SA, Australia, 5067
